title: — Felix Saaro is a debater,   and software developer who is interested in people & technology.

items.title: A new beginning!
items.content: After almost 2 years in the Netherlands I'm back in Switzerland working on my further education.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
items.content: Since the end of 2018 I am working once again as a Full-Stack Developer. This time with a different technology stack and more responsibility than ever.

items.title: Front-End Developer
items.content: This year was probably the most exciting yet. In January I moved from Switzerland to Amsterdam and started a new job with a totally different focus than what i did before. Goodbye .Net and hello JavaScript!

image.alt: Tiny houses on a canal in Amsterdam.

items.title: Front-End Developer
items.content: After 4 years I finished my traineeship to become a Full-Stack Developer. I continued working at the company I dit the traineeship at. In September of that year I embarked in on of my most exciting and challenging adventures yet, a 3 months trip throught the islands and mountains of south-east Asia.

image.alt: A small fishing village on Koh Rong in Cambodia.
